_note: This is an example of what MOS-Strategist produces after consuming the audience profile. Uses Growth Playbook #6 (Marketing Mistakes Content) and Revenue-First Measurement.

campaign_context.name: Attribution Reality Check
campaign_context.goal: Generate 30 demo requests from marketing directors at B2B SaaS companies in 45 days
campaign_context.growth_playbook: Playbook 6: Marketing Mistakes Content — failure/pain content gets 3-5x higher engagement. This audience has been burned by analytics tools before.

audience.primary_segment: Marketing Directors at B2B SaaS companies, $5M-$30M ARR
audience.pain_point: Can't connect marketing spend to revenue — CFO thinks marketing is a cost center
audience.current_belief: Attribution is impossible to get right. Every tool gives different numbers. Just pick one and hope.
audience.desired_belief: Revenue attribution is solvable without an engineering team. The right tool makes you the smartest person in the leadership meeting.
objections: We tried attribution tools before and they didn't work — why is this different?
Our tech stack is too messy for any tool to track properly
My engineering team won't implement another tracking system
voice_of_customer: I spend more time building reports than reading them
My CEO thinks marketing is a cost center because I can't prove otherwise
We tried 3 attribution tools and they all showed different numbers

messaging.core_promise: Know exactly which campaigns drive revenue — without begging engineering for help.
messaging.key_differentiator: Works across your entire stack in 15 minutes, not 15 weeks. No engineering required.
proof_points: Acme SaaS cut reporting time from 12 hours/week to 45 minutes and identified $340K in wasted ad spend
Average customer proves ROI to their CFO within the first board meeting (30 days)
92% of users connect all channels within the first hour — no code required
messaging.tone: Direct, empathetic, slightly provocative. We understand the pain because we've seen it 100 times.

deliverables.format: Text post, 1200 chars max. Use Hook Formula #6 (Harsh Reality) for posts 1-2, Formula #4 (Contrarian Challenge) for posts 3-4, Formula #3 (Social Proof) for post 5.
deliverables.cta: Link to 'Attribution Reality Check' landing page
deliverables.notes: Each post should end with an engagement closer from marketing-wisdom.md

deliverables.format: 4-email nurture sequence for demo request leads. Segment: One-and-Done pattern from marketing-wisdom.md. 150-200 words each.
deliverables.notes: Use activation gap principles — push value, don't pull users. Email 1 should include a sample dashboard screenshot.

deliverables.format: Long-form landing page. Hero + social proof + 3 pain points + solution + case study + FAQ + CTA. Follow BOFU copy principles.
deliverables.cta: See Your Revenue Attribution in 15 Minutes
deliverables.notes: This is BOFU content — visitors are comparing solutions. Lead with differentiators, not features. Address objections inline.

never_mention: Don't trash GA4 directly — our audience uses it and we integrate with it
Don't claim 'perfect attribution' — no tool is perfect, and our audience is skeptical of overclaims
Don't use: streamline, leverage, game-changing, best-in-class
required_elements: Include '15 minutes' time-to-value claim in every piece
Link to live demo or sandbox, not just a form
Include at least one voice-of-customer quote per deliverable

measurement.tracking_notes: UTM: utm_campaign=attribution-reality-check, utm_source=linkedin/email. Track demo-to-opportunity conversion at 60 days.

activation_plan.first_value_moment: See their own data visualized in the demo — not a generic demo, their actual channels
activation_plan.time_to_value: 15 minutes from signup to first connected dashboard
activation_plan.ghost_user_plan: Auto-generate sample report using their website URL. Send via email within 1 hour of signup.
activation_plan.one_and_done_plan: If they connect 1 channel but don't return: send 'Here's what we found' email with 3 insights from their data.
activation_plan.success_signal: User connects 3+ channels and views their attribution dashboard
